text: geudaedeul-i anaewa ihonhayeossgo geulihayeo geunyeodeul-i jasin-ui gigan-e dodalhayeossdamyeon, geunyeodeulgwa geunyeodeul-ui (ijeon) nampyeon-i habdanghan bangsig-eulo seolo manjoghal gyeong-ue geudaedeul(yeoseong-ui bohojadeul)eun geunyeodeul-i geudeulgwa gyeolhonhaneun geos-eul jeojihaji malla. ilosseo geudaedeul jung hananim-eul midgo choehuui nal-eul midneun janeun galeuchim-eul eodnola. igeos-i geudaedeul-ege deo gogyeolhan geos-imyeo deo kkaekkeushan geos-ila. hananimkkeseoneun asina geudaedeul-eun alji moshanola
